The claim was made by Dr: David Murdock, a research cardiologist with the Aspirus health system in Wausau, who attended a re-open rally in Mosinee and posted his views on Facebook.
The claim is supported by the consensus: 3. Many experts have stated that a true return to normalcy is unlikely until a widely available vaccine is developed, which could take a year or more.
The claim is also supported by the fact: complete eradication of COVID-19 would be a major undertaking and may not be possible.
